_header: Saint George the good knight a holy man was he
Subjects: saints’ lives; George, saint, life of
_description: A variant text of the Life of St. George in the South English Legendary — couplets

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt george þe gude knyght a haly man was hegeten & borne
                    in þe lande of caped se full fre…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…þe kynge garte rayse a faire kyrke & craftyly yt
                    dyghteIn þe hond [sic] of owre swete lorde & sayn george
                    þe knyght…
MinULZ822.Editions:
Parker,  Roscoe E. 
             “A Northern Fragment of the Life of St. George.” 
             Modern Language Notes
         38 (1923): 97-101: 97.
Whatley,  Gordon E.,

            University for TEAMS, 2004.
